channel.title: Loading bar ("How would i go about it")
channel.description: How would i go about moving my Loading barr Right to the bottom of my client Like iv seen on some clients and i would really fancie it now but how would i go about itt??

item.title: Loading bar ("How would i go about it")
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

Search for “Unpacking media” and you will get a method. (I would search myself but…) Search up that method and look for where it draws the square. (Pretty obvious because its going to have a HEX [Search it up if you don’t know what HEX is] in the drawer) Change the x and y axis and your done :)!

Read full topic
item.source: Loading bar ("How would i go about it")
